item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Clifton Fadiman
item.description: "Cheese - milk's leap toward immortality." -- Clifton Fadiman

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Diplomacy is the art of saying ‘nice doggie’ until you can find a rock." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "An onion can make people cry, but there has never been a vegetable invented to make them laugh." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Those are my principles, and if you don't like them...well I have others." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Well, art is art, isn't it? Still, on the other hand, water is water! And east is east and west is west and if you take cranberries and stew them like applesauce they taste much more like prunes than rhubarb does. Now, uh... now you tell me what you know." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Was that you or the duck?" -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by John Cleese
item.description: "He who laughs most, learns best" -- John Cleese

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Monty Python's Flying Circus
item.description: "This parrot is no more. It has ceased to be. It's expired and gone to meet its maker. This is a late parrot. It's a stiff. Bereft of life, it rests in peace. If you hadn't nailed it to the perch, it would be pushing up the daisies. It's rung down the curtain and joined the choir invisible. This is an ex-parrot." -- Monty Python's Flying Circus

item.title: Cannonhistory add a quote by Monty Python's Flying Circus
item.description: "A murderer is only an extroverted suicide." -- Monty Python's Flying Circus
